reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting the economic transition of China's Northeast region through innovation, particularly in the field of intelligent and advanced manufacturing

description.narrative: The project is designed to draw on UK expertise to promote innovation in Northeast China, particularly in the advanced manufacturing sector. It is intended that government officials, research institutions and businesses from Liaoning, Jilin, Heilongjiang and Inner Mongolia provinces, and the National Development and Reform Commission, will draw on UK experience. This will result in greater local collaboration and the effective implementation of policies that encourage innovation, generating opportunities for international businesses, including UK ones.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
